n = int(input())
x = [int(i) for i in input().split()]
m = int(input())
for i in range(m):
    a,b = map(int,input().split())
    a -= 1
    t = b-1
    t1 = x[a]-b
    if a-1>=0:
        x[a-1] += t
    if a+1<n:
        x[a+1] += t1
    x[a] = 0
for i in x:
    print(i)

# cook your dish here
N = int(input())
a = list(map(int,input().split()))
M = int(input())
for _ in range(M):
    x,y = map(int,input().split())
    t = x-1
    if(t-1>=0):
        a[t-1] = a[t-1] + (y -1)
    if(t+1<=N-1):
        a[t+1] = a[t+1] + (a[t] - y)
    a[t] = 0
    
      
for j in a:
    print(j)

Nb=int(input())
tree=list(map(int,input().split()))
Ns=int(input())
for i in range(Ns):
    branch,bird=map(int,input().split())
    branch-=1
    bird-=1
    u=bird
    l=tree[branch]-bird-1
    tree[branch]=0
    if branch-1>=0:
        tree[branch-1]+=u
    try:
        tree[branch+1]+=l
    except:pass
    #print(tree)
for nb in tree: 
    print(nb)

n = int(input())
a = [0] + list(map(int, input().split())) + [0]

m = int(input())

for _ in range(m):
    x, y = list(map(int, input().split()))
    a[x-1] += y-1
    a[x+1] += a[x] - y
    a[x] = 0

for i in a[1:-1]:

n=int(input())
a=list(map(int,input().split()))
m=int(input())
for _ in range(m):
    x,y=map(int,input().split())
    x-=1
    if x-1>=0:
        a[x-1]+=y-1
        
    if x+1 <n:
        a[x+1]+=a[x]-y
    a[x]=0
print(*a ,sep="\n")

# cook your dish here
n=int(input())
a=[int(X) for X in input().split()]
a=[0]+a
for j in range(int(input())):
    x,y = map(int,input().split())

    if x!=1:
        a[x-1]+=y-1
    if x!=n:
        a[x+1]+=(a[x]-y)
    a[x]=0
print(*a[1:],sep='\n')

# cook your dish here
n=int(input())
l=list(map(int,input().split()))
q=int(input())
for u in range(q):
    x,y=list(map(int,input().split()))
    x-=1
    if(x-1>=0):
        l[x-1]+=(y-1)
    if(x+1<n):
        l[x+1]+=(l[x]-y)
    l[x]=0
for i in l:
    print(i)

#dt = {} for i in x: dt[i] = dt.get(i,0)+1
import sys;input = sys.stdin.readline
inp,ip = lambda :int(input()),lambda :[int(w) for w in input().split()]

n = inp()
x = ip()
m = inp()
for i in range(m):
    ind,pos = ip()
    ind -= 1
    t = x[ind]
    x[ind] = 0
    if ind >= 1:
        x[ind-1] += pos-1
    if ind <= n-2:
        x[ind+1] += t-pos
for i in range(n):
    print(x[i])

n = int(input())
A = list(map(int, input().split()))

m = int(input())
for _ in range(m):
    x, y = map(int, input().split())
    x -= 1
    y -= 1

    left = y
    right = A[x] - left - 1
    
    A[x] = 0
    
    if x - 1 >= 0:
        A[x - 1] += left
    if x + 1 < n:
        A[x + 1] += right
    
for a in A:
    print(a)
